text: Petër Tošev Mladenov (; 22 August 1936 – 31 May 2000) was a Bulgarian communist diplomat and politician. He was the last leader of the Bulgarian People's Republic from 1989 to 1990 and briefly the first President of the Republic of Bulgaria in 1990. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Presidents of Bulgaria Category:European diplomats Category:Communists
title: Petar Mladenov
